headline.print_headline: Orioles' Cruz and Yankees' Jeter Make All-Star Rosters
headline.main: Orioles' Cruz and Yankees' Jeter Make All-Star Rosters

docs.snippet: Baltimore slugger Nelson Cruz was named to Major League Baseball’s All-Star Game on Sunday, one season after serving a 50-game suspension in conjunction with baseball's performance-enhancing drugs scandal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltimore slugger Nelson Cruz was named to Major League Baseball’s All-Star Game on Sunday, one season after serving a 50-game suspension in conjunction with baseball's performance-enhancing drugs scandal.

headline.print_headline: Bellicose North Korea Lightens Up With Promise of Cheerleaders
headline.main: Bellicose North Korea Lightens Up With Promise of Cheerleaders

docs.snippet: North Korea said on Monday it will send cheerleaders along with its athletes to the Asian Games in the South as a gesture of peace after weeks of firing rockets and fiery rhetoric....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea said on Monday it will send cheerleaders along with its athletes to the Asian Games in the South as a gesture of peace after weeks of firing rockets and fiery rhetoric.

headline.print_headline: Argentina's Kicillof to Lead Debt Delegation to NY
headline.main: Argentina's Kicillof to Lead Debt Delegation to NY

docs.snippet: Argentina's economy minister will meet with a court-appointed negotiator on Monday aiming to resolve a long dispute with U.S. holdout creditors, the economy ministry said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina's economy minister will meet with a court-appointed negotiator on Monday aiming to resolve a long dispute with U.S. holdout creditors, the economy ministry said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: North Korea to Send Cheering Squad to Asian Games
headline.main: North Korea to Send Cheering Squad to Asian Games

docs.snippet: North Korea said Monday it will send a cheering squad to the coming Asian Games in rival South Korea that its athletes plan to attend....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea said Monday it will send a cheering squad to the coming Asian Games in rival South Korea that its athletes plan to attend.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Invesco Star Woodford's Start-Up Bets on Tobacco, Drug Firms
headline.main: Ex-Invesco Star Woodford's Start-Up Bets on Tobacco, Drug Firms

docs.snippet: Star British fund manager Neil Woodford, who left Invesco Perpetual in April to start his own firm, is beginning his new role with a focus on tobacco and drug stocks, believing they can withstand what he expects will be a faltering global economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Star British fund manager Neil Woodford, who left Invesco Perpetual in April to start his own firm, is beginning his new role with a focus on tobacco and drug stocks, believing they can withstand what he expects will be a faltering global economy.

headline.main: Immigrants From Latin America and Africa Squeezed as Banks Curtail International Money Transfers

docs.snippet: Under regulatory pressure, many banks are ending or limiting money transfers, most likely meaning higher costs for immigrants sending money home....
docs.abstract: Under regulatory pressure, many banks are ending or limiting money transfers, most likely meaning higher costs for immigrants sending money home.

headline.print_headline: Flavor Flav Cited by Police Over Fireworks Show
headline.main: Flavor Flav Cited by Police Over Fireworks Show

docs.lead_paragraph: Police have cited rapper Flavor Flav over his annual Fourth of July fireworks show outside his Las Vegas home.

headline.print_headline: Boeing to Feel Little Impact From Train Derailment-Analysts
headline.main: Boeing to Feel Little Impact From Train Derailment-Analysts

docs.snippet: Boeing Co will easily recover financially from a 19-car train derailment in Montana last week that sent three fuselages for its popular 737 jetliner tumbling down a steep embankment toward a river and damaged other plane parts, analysts said on Su...
docs.lead_paragraph: Boeing Co will easily recover financially from a 19-car train derailment in Montana last week that sent three fuselages for its popular 737 jetliner tumbling down a steep embankment toward a river and damaged other plane parts, analysts said on Sunday.

headline.sub: Violent protests following the killing of Palestinian teen
headline.main: Violent protests following the killing of Palestinian teen

headline.print_headline: Sleuthing Her Way to the Top, Cloaked in Many Disguises
headline.seo: Vidya Balan Stars in ‘Bobby Jasoos,’ a Bollywood Film
headline.main: Sleuthing Her Way to the Top, Cloaked in Many Disguises

docs.snippet: The Bollywood star Vidya Balan plays a woman who aspires to be the top detective in Hyderabad in “Bobby Jasoos.”...
docs.abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie Bobby Jasoos, directed by Samar Shaikh and starring Vidya Balan.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Bollywood star Vidya Balan plays a woman who aspires to be the top detective in Hyderabad in “Bobby Jasoos.”
